about_the_game:
The Wishing Well features a standout combat system: determine your strategy by Math. This game allows you to calculate your stats with the key of "The higher your points are, the more damage you deal" (In case that's threatening, it only involves basic Math!)

Calculate your damage


Perform a calculation to create your action and scale its effectiveness with the calculation result! Each operation links to a friend, which holds different abilities, and triggers them to attack when used in an equation. Your result will scale the strength of the friend(s) performing actions. Try out different combos in different scenarios!

Discover numerous actions


Explore the world full of stickmen each with different combat styles and traits, both friends and foes! Embark on the journey and meet new enemies along with new challenges. Which one is the most fabulous to you?

Unleash powerful abilities


Upgrade and unlock various potentials including Ultimate moves, Consumables, and Perks to help you through this adventure. Prepare to embrace strength other than calculation! Who doesn't like that?

Retro style visual


Bring back the old-school cartoony art style! Experience the stylized stickman smoothly animated frame-by-frame in the colorful fantasy world. Let's enjoy every aspect of The Wishing Well!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A math-powered adventure awaits! Join the friends on a quest for The Wishing Well. Conquer foes in 2D turn-based combats where your calculation skills are the key to victory. Sharpen your mind by solving math puzzles in a charming world brought to life with a classic cartoon art style!
